title: What song instantly takes you somewhere else? Where does it take you? - Quora

response.answer_text: I love listening to songs while travelling. The trip from the town to my village is around 8 hours long. The way is full of beautiful sceneries. It a pleasant feeling wearing your headphones , listening to your favorite songs and enjoying the beauty of nature while completing the journey. I have a ton of songs but I’ll just list the ones related to the question.  5 Seconds Of Summer - Youngblood  Coldplay - A Sky Full Of Stars  ILLENIUM, Jon Bellion - Good Things Fall Apart  Lost Sky - Dreams pt. II (feat. Sara Skinner)  The Chainsmokers - Don't Let Me Down Whenever I play these songs it takes my mind to those beautiful sceneries on the way to my village. This is kind of my way to recall memories.
Slow Ride ~ Foghat It takes me back to the high school days at parties on weekends. It's a great song for sex.
